name: Blood Cookies
entries: Ingredients: x2 Very Rare Fiend Meat, x3 Wireweed
Effect: Melee weapon attacks that use Strength or Dexterity deal an additional 1d6 damage of their type, or 1d10 additional damage if they are heavy.

description.chatFlavor: Melee weapon attacks that use Strength or Dexterity deal an additional 1d6 damage of their type, or 1d10 if heavy.
